channel.title: Imperial County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Imperial County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-8 East - Arizona Exit 1
item.description: I-8 east approaching Arizona Exit 1 - Redondo Center Drive/Giss Parkway. This sign appears to have been placed by the Arizona DOT.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 172
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 172 - Winterhaven/Fourth Ave. This is the last exit in California along I-8 east. Also crossing the California Wasteway.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 172
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 172. Use Exit 172 for Yuma Crossing, Museums, and Historic District. Also use Exit 172 for the Arizona Welcome Center. While Exit 172 is in California, it does provide access to the city of Yuma, Arizona. This sign appears to have been placed by the Arizona DOT.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 172
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 172 - Winterhaven Drive/Fourth Ave.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 170
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 170 - Winterhaven Drive

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 166
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 166 - Algodones Road/Andrade. Algodones Road is signed as CA-186, but is not marked on this sign. CA-186 is a short spur that connects I-8 with the Algodones Port of Entry with Mexico.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 166
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 166. Use Exit 166 for CA-186 to Mexico.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 166
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 166 - CA-186/Algodones Road/Andrade. Use CA-186 south for access to the Algodones Port of Entry with Mexico. The Port of Entry is closed from 10 PM to 6 AM.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 164
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 164 - Sidewinder Road.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 159
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 159 - Ogilby Road.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 159
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 159 - Imperial County S-34 to Blythe.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 151
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 151 - Gordons Well

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 143
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 143 - CA-98 Junction

item.description: I-8 east at Exit 131 - CA-115 Junction

item.description: I-8 east at Exit 128 - Bonds Corner Road

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 125
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 125 - CA-7 South/Orchard Road

item.title: I-8 East Approaching CA-7 - Port of Entry Hours
item.description: I-8 east approaching CA-7 - Border Crossing Hours. Port of Entry Closed from 12AM to 6AM.

item.title: I-8 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-8 east. Distances to Holtville, Yuma, and Tucson.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 120
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 120 - Bowker Road

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-111 South at Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-111 South at Split. Use CA-111 south for Calexico. Use CA-78 east for Holtville.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-111 South Approaching Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-111 South approaching split. Turn right for CA-111 south.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-86 South at Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-86 South at Split. Turn right for CA-86 south to El Centro. Continue east on CA-78 for Blythe.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-86 South Approaching Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-86 South approaching CA-78/CA-86 split. Use CA-78 east for Blythe. Use CA-86 south for El Centro.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-86 South
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-86 South

item.title: CA-111 North - Distance Marker
item.description: CA-111 north to Brawley, Calipatria, and Indio, just north of Evan Hewes Hwy.

item.title: CA-111 North - Distance Marker
item.description: CA-111 north to Heber, Brawley, and Indio, north of CA-98.

item.description: CA-111 north approaching CA-78.

item.title: CA-111 North Approaching CA-86
item.description: CA-111 north approaching CA-86 north to Heber.

item.description: CA-111 north approaching I-8/Yuma/El Centro, 1/2 mile.

item.description: CA-111 north at CA-78.

item.title: CA-111 North at CA-78
item.description: CA-111 north at CA-78. CA-111 north follows CA-78 west through Brawley.

item.description: CA-111 north to Brawley at CA-86 north to Heber.

item.title: CA-111 North at CA-86
item.description: CA-111 north at CA-86 north. CA-86/Heber Road sign on signal.

item.title: CA-111 North at CA-98
item.description: CA-111 north to El Centro, at CA-98 east Yuma, and west to San Diego. CA-98 parallels the southern border of California.

item.title: CA-111 North at Evan Hewes Highway
item.description: CA-111 north to Brawley, at Evan Hewes Highway, west to El Centro, and east to Holtville.

item.description: CA-111 north at I-8 east to Yuma.

item.description: CA-111 north at I-8 west to El Centro.

item.description: CA-111 North/CA-78 West at CA-111/CA-78 split. CR-S31 follows CA-111 north.

item.description: CA-111 south of Evan Hewes Hwy., to I-8 and Calexico.

item.description: CA-111 south approaching I-8/Yuma/San Diego, 1/2 mile.

item.description: CA-111 south at CA-78. CA-111 follows CA-78 east through Brawley.

item.description: CA-111 south at I-8 west to San Diego.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-111 North at Split

item.description: CA-86 North/CA-78 West in Brawley, just north of CA-86 jct.

item.title: CA-86 North/CA-78 West at CA-78 West
item.description: CA-86 North/CA-78 West at CA-78 West to Oceanside and Julian. Border Patrol Checkpoint in background.

item.title: End CA-111 South at International Border
item.description: End CA-111 at the International Boundary. Mexicali is just past the border post.

item.title: CA-186 North - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on CA-186 north, just north of US Customs.

item.title: CA-186 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Begin CA-186 south at I-8 to Andrade (California) and Algodones (Mexico).

item.title: CA-186 South - International Boundary
item.description: International boundary 500 Feet, Last U Turn in USA on CA-186 south approaching Mexico customs.

item.title: CA-186 South - Weapons/Ammo Illegal In Mexico
item.description: Weapons and Ammunition Illegal in Mexico on CA-186 south approaching Mexico customs.

item.description: CA-186 south at I-8 west to Yuma.

item.title: CA-78 East at CA-86
item.description: CA-78 east at CA-86 to Indio, Brawley, and Calexico. Building at right side of picture (behind sign - in front of antenna) is a border patrol checkpoint.

item.description: CA-78 west to Julian, Escondido, and Oceanside just west of CA-86.
